writing.name: CONTINUE
writing.text: Continue

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_CLASSROOM_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Who said 'There are 10 kinds of people in the world: those who understand binary numberals, and those who don't.

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_CLASSROOM_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Ian Steward!

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: Whoa... they both knew the answer...

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: How did you guys both know the answer?! I should brush up on my trivia...

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_05
writing.text: Do you guys spend all your free time watching Jeoporady at home...?

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_06
writing.text: Well I had a job since I was young.

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_07
writing.text: ... left after a specific event...

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_09
writing.text: What about you?

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_10
writing.text: I just had a lot of spare time...

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_11
writing.text: I was kinda isolated for being weird...

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_12
writing.text: ... I did have a best friend... but he left because of something I said...

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_13
writing.text: You guys Wanna hangout after school?

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_14
writing.text: Sure.

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_15
writing.text: Heck yes!

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Let's play pinball...? The Sopranos.

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_FOUND_NOTE_ASH
writing.text: Ash Note

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DOUND_NOTE_MAX
writing.text: Max Note

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DIALOGUE_NOTE_ASH
writing.text: Ash acts like he knows what he is doing by following what we are doing. He looks worried and sighs at the end of every game.

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DIALOGUE_NOTE_MAX
writing.text: Max follows us around and keeps talking about her past. Everything seems to remind her of what she did with her best friend before.

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DIALOGUE_02_ASH
writing.text: I'm going to check out the Starwars pinball game... Wanna come?

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DIALOGUE_02_ASH_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Join Ash

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DIALOGUE_02_ASH_CHOICE_02
writing.text: Join Max

writing.name: DAY4_TRANSITION_01_ARCADE_DIALOGUE_NOTE_02_ASH
writing.text: 6011 Donald Brenn Way
